issue.title: [IR] [C++] Table flatbuffer object fails to compile on older GCCs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-14139](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-14139). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
See https://github.com/duckdb/duckdb/pull/2331#issue-1007080354.

The `Table` name in the compute IR fbs conflicts with an internal object name of the flatbuffers library itself.
